extendedInfo.description: Sun & Beach Hong Kong provides information of the 41 gazetted public beaches managed by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department (LCSD) in Hong Kong. Get the app now, enjoy the sunshine and every incredible moment on the beaches in Hong Kong!Features:- Display current weather and warning(s) in force- Find nearby beaches (requires GPS or network positioning)- List all beaches by district- Map, facilities list & enquiry number of each beach- Lifeguard service hours of each beach (if applies)- English & Chinese user interfaceTags: Beach, Summer, Holiday, Vacation, Sun, Lifeguard, Weather, Hong Kong, HKDisclaimerThis website / product / service contains information that is copied or extracted from data made available by the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (the âGovernmentâ) at http://www.gov.hk/Data.One/ (âData.Oneâ). The provision of information copied or extracted from or a link to Data.One at this website or in relation to the product or service shall not constitute any form of co-operation or affiliation by the Government with any person in relation to this website, the product or the service or any contents herein. Nothing in this website, the product or the service shall give rise to any representation, warranty or implication that the Government agrees with, approves of, recommends or endorses any contents of this website or the product or the service. The Government does not have any liability, obligation or responsibility whatsoever for any loss, destruction or damage (including without limitation consequential loss, destruction or damage) howsoever arising from or in respect of your use or misuse of or reliance on or inability to use any contents herein.

reviews.title: Not very useful
reviews.comment: No information on how to get to the beach, water quality, reviews etc. A bit lazy really.
reviews.author: Ed Bin

reviews.title: water quality
reviews.comment: wish you offer water qualities of the beaches, otherwise take a walk in vain if water quality was bad at the moment without notification
reviews.author: Rio Wong

reviews.comment: Good though, you better adjust the app to fit different resolution
reviews.author: A Google User
